nodes.bodyText: I think this makes sense, but I need to ask @MarianMacik about it as he's been working with this more closely.
ok, let me know if there is other way. Adding all ignores does not makes sense
For consistency, maybe we can use this PR to include a 200 response code for this method.
200 is the default, so it is implicit
